headline: Piper Sandler Says These 2 Stocks Are Top Picks for the Second Half of 2025
summary: There’s no magic formula for picking winning stocks, but having the right guide can make all the difference. That’s where Wall Street’s analysts come in. With a front-row seat to market movements and company performance, these pros make it their business to spot standout opportunities. And now, with 2025 beyond the halfway mark, it’s the perfect moment to check in on the names they’re backing for the rest of the year. Watching the current mid-year situation for Piper Sandler, analyst Jason Bedna
